entry.value:
{"id":"5697549a-1883-4b68-a701-7168c34a4f2e","name":"AndroidManifest.xml Accessibility Config Not Found","timestamp":1751028160849,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
<additional_data>
Below are some potentially helpful/relevant pieces of information for figuring out to respond
<current_file>
```xml:app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml, lines=ALL(1-45)
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">

 <application
 android:allowBackup="true"
 android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules"
 android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules"
 android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher"
 android:label="@string/app_name"
 android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round"
 android:supportsRtl="true"
 android:theme="@style/Theme.Moduletest"
 android:name="com.kkh.multimodule.LimberApplication"
 tools:targetApi="31">
 <activity
 android:name="com.kkh.multimodule.MainActivity"
 android:exported="true"
 android:label="@string/app_name"
 android:theme="@style/Theme.Moduletest">
 <intent-filter>
 <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
 <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
 <action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
 <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
 <category android:name="android.intent.category.BROWSABLE" />
 <data android:scheme="myapp" android:host="home" />
 </intent-filter>
 </activity>

 <service
 android:name="com.kkh.accessibility.BlockedAppAccessibilityService"
 android:permission="android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE"
 android:exported="true">
 <intent-filter>
 <action android:name="android.accessibilityservice.AccessibilityService" />
 </intent-filter>
 <meta-data
 android:name="android.accessibilityservice"
 android:resource="@xml/accessibility_service_config" />
 </service>

 </application>

</manifest>
```
</current_file>


<linter_errors>
## Linter Errors

Path: app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml
Errors:

Line 40: Cannot resolve symbol '@xml/accessibility_service_config'
</linter_errors>


<attached_files>
<file_contents>
```xml:app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml, lines=ALL(1-11)
 <service
 android:name="com.kkh.accessibility.BlockedAppAccessibilityService"
 android:permission="android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE"
 android:exported="true">
 <intent-filter>
 <action android:name="android.accessibilityservice.AccessibilityService" />
 </intent-filter>
 <meta-data
 android:name="android.accessibilityservice"
 android:resource="@xml/accessibility_service_config" />
 </service>
```
</file_contents>

</attached_files>
</additional_data>
<user_query>
@AndroidManifest.xml 내가 이부분 accessibility모듈에 넣어놨는데 왜 감지못해?
</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"thinking","thinking":"사용자가 AndroidManifest.xml에서 accessibility 모듈에 있는 `@xml/accessibility_service_config` 파일을 인식하지 못한다고 하고 있습니다. 

Linter 에러를 보면 "Cannot resolve symbol '@xml/accessibility_service_config'" 라고 나와있습니다.

사용자가 accessibility 모듈에 해당 파일을 넣어놨다고 하니, 아마 멀티모듈 프로젝트에서 메인 앱 모듈이 accessibility 모듈의 리소스를 참조하지 못하는 상황인 것 같습니다.

먼저 프로젝트 구조를 파악해보고, accessibility 모듈이 실제로 존재하는지, 그리고 해당 xml 파일이 있는지 확인해야겠습니다.","signature":""},{"type":"text","text":""}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01K1AUgtDiTsevnDm1YZQGnC","type":"function","function":{"name":"list_dir","arguments":"{"relative_workspace_path": "./", "explanation": "프로젝트의 전체 구조를 확인하여 accessibility 모듈이 있는지 파악"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"list_dir","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01K1AUgtDiTsevnDm1YZQGnC","content":"Contents of directory:

```"},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"`accessibility_service_config.xml` 파일이 `core/accessibility` 모듈에 있지만, 앱 모듈에서 접근할 수 없는 이유는 **리소스 경로 참조 문제**입니다.

앱 모듈의 AndroidManifest.xml에서 `@xml/accessibility_service_config`를 참조할 때, 이는 앱 모듈의 `res/xml/` 경로를 찾습니다. 하지만 해당 파일은 `core/accessibility` 모듈에 있기 때문에 찾을 수 없습니다.

**해결방법:**

1. `accessibility_service_config.xml` 파일을 앱 모듈로 이동:

```xml:app/src/main/res/xml/accessibility_service_config.xml
```

2. 또는 accessibility 서비스 선언 자체를 accessibility 모듈의 AndroidManifest.xml로 이동하고, 앱 모듈에서는 해당 서비스만 참조하도록 변경

accessibility 모듈에 의존성이 추가되어 있어도, 리소스 파일은 각 모듈의 경로에서만 접근 가능합니다."}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
<additional_data>
Below are some potentially helpful/relevant pieces of information for figuring out to respond
<current_file>
```xml:core/accessibility/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml, lines=ALL(1-18)
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"

 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS" tools:ignore="ProtectedPermissions" />

 <service
 android:name="com.kkh.accessibility.BlockedAppAccessibilityService"
 android:permission="android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE"
 android:exported="true">

 <action android:name="android.accessibilityservice.AccessibilityService" />
 </intent-filter>

 android:name="android.accessibilityservice"
 android:resource="@xml/accessibility_service_config" />

</manifest>
```

</additional_data>
<user_query>
그럼 @AndroidManifest.xml 이런식으로 accessibility 모듈에서 선언하면안돼?
</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":""}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01S5faSaE8HDwtKLtiode7ST","type":"function","function":{"name":"edit_file","arguments":"{"target_file": "app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml", "instructions": "I will remove the accessibility service declaration from the app module's AndroidManifest.xml since it's already declared in the accessibility module.", "code_edit": "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\n<manifest xmlns:android=\"http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android\"\n xmlns:tools=\"http://schemas.android.com/tools\">\n\n <application\n android:allowBackup=\"true\"\n android:dataExtractionRules=\"@xml/data_extraction_rules\"\n android:fullBackupContent=\"@xml/backup_rules\"\n android:icon=\"@mipmap/ic_launcher\"\n android:label=\"@string/app_name\"\n android:roundIcon=\"@mipmap/ic_launcher_round\"\n android:supportsRtl=\"true\"\n android:theme=\"@style/Theme.Moduletest\"\n android:name=\"com.kkh.multimodule.LimberApplication\"\n tools:targetApi=\"31\">\n <activity\n android:name=\"com.kkh.multimodule.MainActivity\"\n android:exported=\"true\"\n android:label=\"@string/app_name\"\n android:theme=\"@style/Theme.Moduletest\">\n <intent-filter>\n <action android:name=\"android.intent.action.MAIN\" />\n <category android:name=\"android.intent.category.LAUNCHER\" />\n <action android:name=\"android.intent.action.VIEW\" />\n <category android:name=\"android.intent.category.DEFAULT\" />\n <category android:name=\"android.intent.category.BROWSABLE\" />\n <data android:scheme=\"myapp\" android:host=\"home\" />\n </intent-filter>\n </activity>\n\n </application>\n\n</manifest>"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01S5faSaE8HDwtKLtiode7ST","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

```
@@ -29,17 +29,6 @@
 </activity>

The edit was successful with no linter errors."},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"맞습니다! accessibility 모듈에서 이미 서비스를 선언했으니 앱 모듈에서는 중복 선언할 필요가 없습니다. 

Android의 멀티모듈 구조에서는 각 모듈의 AndroidManifest.xml이 빌드 시 자동으로 병합됩니다. accessibility 모듈에 서비스가 선언되어 있고 앱 모듈에서 해당 모듈을 의존성으로 추가했다면, 서비스가 최종 APK에 포함됩니다.

앱 모듈에서 중복으로 선언하면 오히려 리소스 참조 오류가 발생하므로, accessibility 모듈에서만 선언하는 것이 올바른 방법입니다."}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
<additional_data>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 package="com.kkh.multimodule.accessibility" >

 <uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="27" />

 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES" />
 <uses-permission
 android:name="android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS"
 tools:ignore="ProtectedPermissions" />

 <service
 android:name="com.kkh.accessibility.BlockedAppAccessibilityService"
 android:exported="true"
 android:permission="android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE" >
 <intent-filter>
 <action android:name="android.accessibilityservice.AccessibilityService" />
 </intent-filter>

 <meta-data
 android:name="android.accessibilityservice"
 android:resource="@xml/accessibility_service_config" />
 </service>

</manifest>
```
</current_file>

AndroidManifest.xml에서 service는 반드시 application 태그 안에 선언되어야 합니다."}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_bdrk_013dTR71Zr5BFZ9NiYeEcfdy","type":"function","function":{"name":"edit_file","arguments":"{"target_file": "core/accessibility/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml", "instructions": "I will wrap the service declaration inside an application tag to fix the manifest structure.", "code_edit": "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\n<manifest xmlns:android=\"http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android\"\n xmlns:tools=\"http://schemas.android.com/tools\">\n <uses-permission android:name=\"android.permission.QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES\" />\n <uses-permission android:name=\"android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS\" tools:ignore=\"ProtectedPermissions\" />\n\n <application>\n <service\n android:name=\"com.kkh.accessibility.BlockedAppAccessibilityService\"\n android:permission=\"android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE\"\n android:exported=\"true\">\n <intent-filter>\n <action android:name=\"android.accessibilityservice.AccessibilityService\" />\n </intent-filter>\n <meta-data\n android:name=\"android.accessibilityservice\"\n android:resource=\"@xml/accessibility_service_config\" />\n </service>\n </application>\n</manifest>"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_013dTR71Zr5BFZ9NiYeEcfdy","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

이제 빌드가 정상적으로 작동할 것입니다."}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
